legend.split: 4 Sub-Splits will be determined at SITE, after each Major split.
6 at OP (Morning) → 2 at LR for 24h duty after Morning duty, 1 from each subgroup rotates internally.
3 at MT1
3 at MT2
2 at LR (Morning) & 1 at LR/OBG-OT for 24h duty, rotates internally.
2 at LR (Morning) & 1 at LR/OBG-ICU for 24h, rotates internally.
3 at FP Unit
3 at AYUSH Block
2 at GS OT & 1 at ORTHO OT (Morning) → OBG OT for 24h duty after Morning duty, rotates internally.
2 at OBG OT & 1 at ICU 24h duty, rotates internally.
3 at PED - OP
3 at SNCU (Morning) & 1 Stays for 24h duty, rotates internally.
2 at Ward (Morning) & 1 at P-ICU / SNCU for 24h duty, rotates internally.
4 at OP (Morning) & 2 at Emergency/Casualty for 24h duty, 1 from each subgroup, rotates internally.
3 at GS - MSW, 1→OT if Scheduled, else MSW, rotates internally.
3 at GS - FSW, 1 to OT if Scheduled, else FSW, rotates internally.
2 at POW & 1→MSW, rotates internally.
3 at ICU (Morning) & 1 → Stays at ICU for 24h duty, rotates internally.
1 from each subgroup at OT Block if Scheduled, else OP, rotates internally.
1 from each subgroup→Ward & 1 from each subgroup→ OT if scheduled, else OP, rotates internally.
3 at OP (Morning) & 1 → Emergency/Casualty for 24h duty after Morning duty, rotates internally.
2 at Ward, 1 → OT if Scheduled, else at Ward → Emergency/Casualty for 24h duty, rotates internally.
2 at Pathology Lab and 1 at Microbiology Labs.
4 at OP (Morning) & 2 at Emergency/Casualty for 24h duty, 1 from each subgroup rotates internally.
3 at GM - MMW
3 at GM - FMTW
2 at PMW (Morning) & 1 → ICU for 24h duty, rotates internally.
3 at ICU (Morning) & 1 → Stays at ICU for 24h duty, rotates internally.
3 at Forensic Medicine Block
3 at Radiology Block
3 at DVL Unit.
6 at PSY Unit
2 (Morning), 2 (Afternoon) & 2 (Night), 1 from each subgroup, rotates internally.

legend.code: Each 24-hour duty must mandatorily include set number of interns as mentioned in the schedule, rotating internally within the assigned subgroup.  Swaps or replacements are strictly prohibited without valid justification and prior approval from the department.   No post-duty off is permitted, and interns must report to regular duties the following morning without exception. Failure to report for duty without prior intimation will result in reposting or extension of the internship.
